entry.title: A Post Quantum Migration Proposal
entry.summary: In recent discussions among the Bitcoin development community, concerns have been raised regarding the migration of funds to a quantum-safe signature scheme without having previously committed to a dual signature scheme. This challenge poses a significant hurdle in enhancing Bitcoin's security infrastructure. The crux of the issue lies in the difficulty of enabling currently locked funds to utilize a quantum-safe mechanism without fundamentally reiterating the initial migration problem that this effort seeks to solve. The dialogue reflects an ongoing exploration for viable solutions within the cryptocurrency's framework to adapt to emerging cryptographic standards while ensuring the protection of existing assets.
